extension.description: Final Burn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games. Currently, FB Alpha supports games on Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2 hardware, SNK Neo-Geo hardware, Toaplan hardware, Cave hardware, and various games on miscellaneous hardware. Recent releases have started to add back in Sega System 16 emulation. FB Alpha is an open-source project and it is programmed by a group of people known as the FBA Team. Over the years this has comprised of Barry Harris, Jan_Klaassen, KEV, LoopMaster, Mike Haggar, Hyper Yagami and Ayeye. FB Alpha is based on the original FinalBurn by Dave.[CR][CR]Source: https://github.com/libretro/fba-libretro
